sentences.en: He left a bequest to each of his grandchildren.
sentences.cn: 他给他的孙辈每人留下一笔遗产。

sentences.en: The bequest is conservatively estimated at $30 million.
sentences.cn: 这笔遗产被保守地估计为3000万美元。

sentences.en: The church here was left a bequest to hire doctors who would work with the poor.
sentences.cn: 这个教堂收到一笔遗产，用来雇用为穷人治病的医生。
